content: For example, tech, I think this past year, our EBITDA had a 37% decline from the first quarter of 2022 to the second quarter of 2022, not because the business suddenly became terrible, but because of a combination of the fact that big jobs could benefit or negatively impact any quarter, and the fact that our commitment to making the right investments and people independent of whether that big job happened to be there or quarter can further exacerbate a slow quarter.
